emptyCategory: There are no competitions in this category yet
error: Oops! We couldn't load competitions. Please try again later.

competition.emptyCategory: No competition information in this category yet
competition.error: Oops! We couldn't load the competition information. Please check the link for accuracy or try again later.

age.number: Enter the participant's age as a number
age.min: The minimum age of the participant cannot be less than 14 years

name.min: The competition name must contain at least 4 characters
name.max: The competition name cannot exceed 64 characters

description.min: The competition description must contain at least 4 characters
description.max: The competition description cannot exceed 256 characters

tours.number: Enter the number of rounds as a number
tours.positive: The number of rounds must be more than zero

closes_at.afterToday: The registration end date must be later than the current date
closes_at.beforeCompetition: The registration end date must be earlier than the competition date

days.date: The match date must be later than the current date
days.end_time: The end time of the match cannot be earlier than its start time

matches.number: Enter the number of matches as a number
matches.positive: The number of matches must be greater than zero

register.success: You have successfully registered for the competition!
register.unknownError: Unknown error while registering for the competition
register.cancelSuccess: You have successfully canceled your registration for the competition!
register.cancelError: Error canceling registration for the competition: {{message}}

registration.unknownError: Unknown error while updating player status
